Highlighting tests

This document uses a variety of linking styles for testing purposes

Inline code

Local:

  • vignette("pkgdown")
  • build_site()
  • ?template_navbar

Remote:

  • MASS::enlist
  • MASS::enlist()
  • ?MASS::enlist

Code blocks

# Shouldn't get linked
enlist(5)
# Should get linked
MASS::enlist(5)
library(MASS)
enlist(5)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 5

# Should get linked because MASS was loaded previously
enlist(5)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 5

cat(crayon:::ansi_colors_8(), sep = "")
#> reset: foobar         bold: foobar          blurred: foobar       
#> italic: foobar        underline: foobar     inverse: foobar       
#> hidden: foobar        strikethrough: foobar black: foobar         
#> red: foobar           green: foobar         yellow: foobar        
#> blue: foobar          magenta: foobar       cyan: foobar          
#> white: foobar         silver: foobar        bgBlack: foobar       
#> bgRed: foobar         bgGreen: foobar       bgYellow: foobar      
#> bgBlue: foobar        bgMagenta: foobar     bgCyan: foobar        
#> bgWhite: foobar

message(crayon::red("foo"))
#> foo

warning(crayon::blue("bar"))
#> Warning: bar

stop(crayon::green("baz"), call. = FALSE)
#> Error: baz
